snippet: Faculty members in the California State University system said Wednesday that they had approved plans for a two-day rolling strike at campuses all over the state.
abstract: Faculty members of the California State University system approve plans for a two-day rolling strike at campuses across the state, protesting sharp funding cuts to the system and stalled contract negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Faculty members in the California State University system said Wednesday that they had approved plans for a two-day rolling strike at campuses all over the state.

headline.seo: California State University Faculty Agrees to Strike
headline.main: California: Faculty Agrees to Campus Strike in the Fall
headline.print_headline: California: Faculty Agrees To Campus Strike In the Fall
